blank stares of broken men

they cant remember when

refrain
pretending im still here

chorus
justify
what ive become

verse 2
amazing disgrace how sweet the sound
that saved a wretch like me
better lost if this is found
best blinded never to see
the race to save face
nothing now is what we meant it to be

refrain
pretending im still here
see lamb of god liveget tickets as low as 14you might also likeguitar solo

prechorus
its a system now
intertwined
take your place in the line
to be ground
by the gears of the masterpiece
betrayal

justify
what ive become

its been so long since

down to ashes

you giveth i taketh away
